segments.text: I know , sweetie . Just open wide . Don't talk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you've got a fever . One-oh-one ... time to break out the children's Tylenol .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have the chills . Can you turn on the heater ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're not turning on the heater in May ! You need to take a bath . We'll heat you up and see if you can sweat this thing out .
segments.speaker: S2
